message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the lion's share, but you get a small piece to get us going.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Time is ticking, and that money's losing value fast!
I'm willing to give you more, but I'm not going to give you 70%. We can both do better than that. Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, I'm compromising. 60/40 is my final offer.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share too!
I'm coming down, but I won't go lower than 70/30.  This is a fair split, considering inflation is hurting your share more than mine.  Let's be smart and agree to this.
